sms_options_recredit_information_text:
You can top up your account automatically if your balance exceeds a certain threshold.
This top-up process takes place automatically, and is charged to your OVHcloud customer account.
sms_options_recredit_information_note: Please note that automatic top-ups will only work if the balance of your OVHcloud customer account is positive or zero. You can top up your customer account in the Telecom Control Panel, in the Billing section.
sms_options_recredit_update_threshold_er: The minimum value of this field is 0.
